content.question: Using the model of the p53/MDM2 pathway, connect the reduction of MDM2 function in mutant mice to the observed concentration of red blood cells.

frqParts.text: Using the model of the p53/MDM2 pathway, connect the reduction of MDM2 function in mutant mice to the observed concentration of red blood cells.

skill.text: 2.C: Explain how biological models relate to larger principles, concepts, processes, systems, or theories.
